blogPost.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
blogPost.body: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
blogPost.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL
blogPost.author: Alex Iskold

localize.description: sqanything可以让你用SQL查询所有打开的Chrome标签页中的HTML表格。你可以将查询结果发送到Google Sheets，或者只是将网页上的所有表格发送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查询网络上的任何数据表。

localize.description: sqanything可以讓你用SQL查詢所有打開的Chrome標籤頁中的HTML表格。你可以將查詢結果發送到Google Sheets，或者只是將網頁上的所有表格發送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查詢網絡上的任何數據表。

previous.excerpt: Bytesize empowers creators to rapidly build clean, mobile-optimized, dynamic sites to help drive engagement between platforms, interact with their fans, and ultimately grow their brand. With Bytesize, your virtual self is just one link away! 🤩
previous.title: Bytesize - Create a beautiful, personal social media canvas in seconds

localize.description: Bytesize使创作者能够快速建立干净、移动优化的动态网站，以帮助推动平台之间的互动，与粉丝互动，并最终发展他们的品牌。有了Bytesize，您的虚拟自我只需一个链接就能实现。🤩
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内创建一个美丽的个人社交媒体画布。

localize.description: Bytesize使創作者能夠快速建立乾淨、移動優化的動態網站，以幫助推動平臺之間的互動，與粉絲互動，並最終發展他們的品牌。有了Bytesize，您的虛擬自我只需一個鏈接就能實現。🤩
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內創建一個美麗的個人社交媒體畫布。

next.excerpt: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
next.title: final - Real time feedback for your video and audio files.

localize.description: final 让您可以轻松地对您的视频和音频文件进行反馈和接收。它用时间戳标记所有的评论，这样你就可以准确地知道在哪里进行修改。你的项目反馈会被存储在一个地方，你再也不用浏览大量的电子邮件了。
localize.tagline: 对您的视频和音频文件进行实时反馈。

localize.description: final 讓您可以輕鬆地對您的視頻和音頻文件進行反饋和接收。它用時間戳標記所有的評論，這樣你就可以準確地知道在哪裏進行修改。你的項目反饋會被存儲在一個地方，你再也不用瀏覽大量的電子郵件了。
localize.tagline: 對您的視頻和音頻文件進行實時反饋。
